amendment.description: Amendment to allow Mutual Holding Companies (MHCs) to waive the receipt of dividends.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 115-163 to allow Mutual Holding Companies (MHCs) to waive the receipt of dividends.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Faso amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 184 (Roll no. 297).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Faso.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
